column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Definitely a must-visit.  It's worth having a plan when you make a visit
column2: unless you've got all day to kill.  If that's the case
column3: it's a great place to take a meandering walk through a multitude of time periods and forms of art.  The Impressionist galleries are my favorite
column5: and while I'm not a huge fan of most modern art
column6: the collection is worth seeing.  Great location
